abstract: State Dept officials report they are working to fix computer hardware glitch affecting processing of photographs and fingerprints that have prevented them from issuing travel visas for at least two weeks.
lead_paragraph: The country receives an average of 50,000 applications daily, and officials say that medical or humanitarian visas deemed priorities will be issued.

headline.main: Computer Failure Leaves State Dept. Unable to Issue Visas
headline.print_headline: World Briefing; Glitch Halts Issuing of U.S. Visas

snippet: The country receives an average of 50,000 applications daily, and officials say that medical or humanitarian visas deemed priorities will be issued.
